prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon that resembles a turtle with a rocky shell and smoke billowing from its back.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a tortoise with a fiery personality and a volcanic landscape around it.
Show me a creature that has a sturdy, round body and emits a warm orange glow, perfect for a desert habitat.
Design a Pokemon with a shell that resembles hardened lava and billows of ash and steam as its distinctive traits.
Give me an image of a turtle-like creature that thrives in volcanic areas and has a calm yet fierce demeanor.
Generate a character that embodies both strength and warmth, with a rounded body and a trail of smoke behind it.
Make a fire-themed Pokemon that has a rocky exterior and a soft, fluffy cloud on its back, suggesting warmth.
